Package ch.zhaw.card2brain.services

Schnittstelle CategoryService

Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
CategoryServiceImpl
public interface CategoryService
Interface for the CategoryService class, providing methods for handling and manipulating categories.

  • Methodendetails

    • getCategoryById

      Category getCategoryById(long id) throws CategoryNotFoundException
      Retrieves a category by its ID, throwing a CategoryNotFoundException if the category cannot be found.
      Parameter:
      id - The ID of the category to retrieve
      Gibt zurück:
      The category with the specified ID
      Löst aus:
      CategoryNotFoundException - if the category cannot be found

    • createCategory

      Category createCategory(Category category)
      Creates a new category.
      Parameter:
      category - The category to be created
      Gibt zurück:
      The created category

    • getAllCategoriesOfUser

      List<Category> getAllCategoriesOfUser(User user)
      Retrieves all categories associated with a specific user.
      Parameter:
      user - The user to retrieve categories for
      Gibt zurück:
      A list of categories associated with the specified user

    • categoryExistsByUser

      boolean categoryExistsByUser(User user, Category category)
      Checks if a category exists for a specific user.
      Parameter:
      user - The user to check for the category
      category - The category to check for
      Gibt zurück:
      True if the category exists for the user, false otherwise

    • isCategoryValid

      boolean isCategoryValid(Category category)
      Validates a category.
      Parameter:
      category - The category to validate
      Gibt zurück:
      True if the category is valid, false otherwise
